sentences.en: Do you mean the love of luxury of extravagance?
sentences.cn: 你这是指爱好奢华,善于挥霍 吗 ?

sentences.en: Food is a necessity, but wine is an extravagance.
sentences.cn: 食物是必需品, 而酒则是奢侈品.

sentences.en: Going to the theatre is our only extravagance.
sentences.cn: 去剧院看戏是我们唯一的奢侈享受。

sentences.en: He had bold flights . He had humour . He had extravagance.
sentences.cn: 他谈笑风生,诙谐有趣,口若悬河.
她唯一的奢侈品就是马。

sentences.en: His extravagance drained all his fortune.
sentences.cn: 他挥霍无度,过着金迷纸醉的生活,耗尽了他的财产.

sentences.en: His extravagance explains why he is always in debt.
sentences.cn: 他挥霍无度,难怪总是欠债.

sentences.en: His income allows of no extravagance in his way of living.
sentences.cn: 他的收入不允许他生活奢侈.

sentences.en: It's the last extravagance we'll be able to indulge in this year.
sentences.cn: 这是我今年所能买的最后一件奢侈品.

sentences.en: Mr. Pearson's income allows of no extravagance in his way of living.
sentences.cn: 皮尔逊先生的收入不允许他过奢侈的生活.

sentences.en: Something in her responded to his extravagance and his exuberant manner.
sentences.cn: 她的内心有什么东西为他的豪放热忱的风度所感染.

sentences.en: Sponging and taking more than one's share and extravagance and waste on the part of cadres must be banned.
sentences.cn: 杜绝干部多吃多占和铺张浪费.

sentences.en: The guardian read his ward a sermon on his extravagance.
sentences.cn: 监护人严词申斥被监护人挥霍浪费.

sentences.en: We must combat extravagance and waste.
sentences.cn: 我们必须反对铺张浪费.

sentences.en: When the company went under, tales of his extravagance surged through the industry.
sentences.cn: 公司破产后，有关他铺张浪费的种种传闻传遍了整个行业。

words.tran_cn: 奢侈的；浪费的；过度的；放纵的
狂妄的言行；内容狂妄的作品；铺张华丽的表演

trans.tran_en: Extravagance is the spending of more money than is reasonable or than you can afford
